description:
Download videos from almost any website worldwide

Download videos from almost any website worldwide
Best-in-class UI interface - Clean, intuitive, and powerful
Built with Electron, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

‚ú® Core Features
üåç Global Video Download Support
- 1000+ Sites Supported - Download videos from almost any website worldwide through yt-dlp engine
- Smart Platform Detection - Automatically detect video platforms and optimize download parameters
- Multi-format Support - Videos, audio tracks, playlists to meet all download needs
- Localized interface support in many languages
üé® Best-in-class UI Experience
- Modern Design - Clean and beautiful interface
- Intuitive Operations - One-click pause/resume/retry
- Real-time Progress - Detailed download progress tracking and status management
- Theme Switching - Support for system/light/dark themes for comfortable viewing
What's Changed
- feat(i18n): add French and Russian language support by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/185
- Add extension build workflow to release pipeline by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/186
- docs: add RSSHub portals to RSS documentation by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/187
- refactor: reorganize cookies settings into three groups by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/188
- feat: add paste and download functionality with ON/OFF badge by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/212
- fix(issue-template): reorder bug report fields by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/248
- fix(download): honor selected MP4/WEBM container by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/250
- feat(i18n): add Turkish locale and complete tray i18n by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/249
- fix(download): mitigate YouTube SABR failures by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/252
- docs(changelog): add multilingual user-facing changelogs by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/256
- fix(download): fallback when requested format is unavailable by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/253
- chore(check): fix check pipeline errors by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/255
- fix(i18n): sync Turkish locale keys by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/258
- chore(release): prepare v1.3.0 by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/259
- ci(workflows): disable extension build and allow manual release trigger by @nexmoe in https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/pull/260
Full Changelog: https://github.com/nexmoe/VidBee/compare/v1.2.4...v1.3.0
